colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(DE LTAR BCOM LDAN 'DAS KHRO RGYAL DUS DGRA'I DBANG, ,MNYES BYED BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR SGOM PA NI, ,BDUD SDE'I TSANG TSING SREG BYED ME LCE DANG, MCHOG MTHUN DNGOS GRUB 'GUG BYED LCAGS KYU'ANG YIN, ,'DI LA NONGS KUN BLA MA LHA'I SPYAN SNGAR, ,'CHAGS SO DGE BA'I PHUNG PO CI THOB PA, ,DE MTHUS TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA YIS, ,BRAL MED RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED KYI BLA MA'I RNAL 'BYOR DNGOS GRUB BDUD RTZI'I CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGAGS PA CHOS KHRIMS PA DAD BRTZON DGE SLONG RIN CHEN RDO RJES BSKUL BA'I NGOR DANG, RANG NYID KYANG TSE RABS KUN TU BLA MA LHA 'DIS RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RTEN 'BREL DU DMIGS TE, BTZUN GZUGS SNYOMS LAS PA SU MA TI MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA 'DI BLO BZANG RGYAL BSTAN YUN RING DU GNAS PA'I CHA RKYEN DU RGYUR CIG , ,,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
